All classes, interfaces and enumerations that are related to entities and their behaviour.

    Methods in com.github.hanyaeger.api that return Updatable
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default Updatable
    EntitySpawnerContainer.callEntitySpawners()
    Call the update(long) of all instances of EntitySpawner that were added to this EntitySpawnerContainer.
    default Updatable
    TimerContainer.callTimers()
    Return an Updatable that, when called, call all the timers that were added to this TimerContainer.
    default Updatable
    UpdateExposer.exposedUpdate()
    Delegates the update(long) to the UpdateExposer.explicitUpdate(long).

    class 
    DynamicCompositeEntity
    When a group of entities is combined to create a single entity, they are a composition and this class should be used to perform that composition.

    Description

  • Uses of Updatable in com.github.hanyaeger.api.scenes

    Classes in com.github.hanyaeger.api.scenes that implement Updatable
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    DynamicScene
    A DynamicScene extends a StaticScene, but adds a Game World Update (GWU).
    class 
    ScrollableDynamicScene
    A ScrollableDynamicScene has exactly the same behaviour as a DynamicScene, but adds the option to differ between the viewable area and the actual window size.

    Description
    Updatable
    DynamicScene.entityCollectionUpdatable()
    Return an Updatable that delegates the update(long) to EntityCollection.update(long).
